lead_paragraph: Ronda Rousey is taking time off to ponder her future after her 48-second loss in her comeback fight at UFC 207.
snippet: Ronda Rousey is taking time off to ponder her future after her 48-second loss in her comeback fight at UFC 207....

headline.main: Retire or Fight Back? UFC Stars Offer Advice to Ronda Rousey
headline.print_headline: Retire or Fight Back? UFC Stars Offer Advice to Ronda Rousey
